text_lines: Immediatly upon entering the shimmering portal, Lulu starts falling as she feels her body transform...

Arrived in an white empty room, something feels wrong. As if space and time were altered and she felt... flat and strangely broken in pieces. When suddenly everything changed as-if straight out of a bad Matrix movie rip-off.

"Hello Lulu. My name is ${demon_name}. And don't worry too much.. you just have arrived in my domain and here, i decide everything. You are in the 0xFF realm and you will have to win at least one of my trials to get out."
Looking at the strange female demon in front of her, Lulu started to understand this will be a pain in the ass.
Walking in the strange castle, Lulu stumbled on multiple corridors leading to the various rooms.
Upon entering one of the corridor, an armor and sheated sword appeared on Lulu. "Providing weapons now? That's going to be easy..."
But the first trap was right at the start and Lulu quickly end caught in tentacles...
"What the hell!"

next.text: "I hope this is not something sexual!"

text_lines: "Read for more?" Lulu reappeared in front of Liadora, fully intact. "That"s a fail for this trial, you have two chances left".
"You really need to find better things to do with your spare time..."
As soon as Lulu finished her sentence she was teleported on a strange go-kart track.
"Now we are talking... riding stuff is my forte!"
But no sooner as she sped into the next turn, she lost control and ended in a wall.
"WHY IS A BANANA PEEL ABLE TO MAKE A GO-KART SLIDE LIKE THAT!!!"
While screaming at the strange fruit with esoteric properties regarding adherence of objects, the other competitors ended the race.
"This is starting to look like a full failure on you end!"
"You will not be able to get me with simple traps like that each time!" shooted Lulu as she suddenly is presented with a shop screen floating in front of her.
"The next trial is a futuristic shooter, choose your weapons well"...
Armed with an holographic coat, an assault riffle and trap detection googles, Lulu started walking toward the shooting arena.
But as soon as she entered the cyberpunk city, a strange floating screen started bipping red in front of her. "Hack in progress, no firewall installed... warning, warning".
"Wait what?!?" Unable to move, as if a puppet with broken strings, Lulu wondered what was happening... while her hand slowly took her handgun from her belt and moved toward her head.
"This is absurd! Nobody explained me this could happen!" BLAM ðŸ’€
"Well, that's 3 for 3 failures, it feels like you are not going anywhere now darling..."
"You better let me go before I go full hulk on your ass..."
"Wait poor child, you can't do anything to me here. But i can offer you a deal. Let a part of me come back with you and I'll let you go"
Feeling as if she had no choice, Lulu accepted... and disappeared in a flash of light.
"Well, that went well ha ha ha"
Coming from a nearby room, a strange man addressed Liadora. "What did you do AGAIN?!?"
"... ok bitch. I don't know who did your dye job, but horrible as it is, i am not worried. Do your worst."
"Whaaaa...."
No worries here regarding that... as teeth appeared and she ended shewed and in a monster stomach. ðŸ’€
Predictably the tentacles started getting touchy
ripping her clothes
and fucking her hard
Just when Lulu started to think that she was actually having a good time
her vision started fading out....
"Let's go already!"

This Story was originally created by [n_Arno](https://civitai.com/user/n_Arno) at [CivitAI: Lulu in the realm of 0xFF](https://civitai.com/articles/19779) and then extended with non-linear elements by [LizArt9](https://civitai.com/user/LizArt9).
"Uh, now **that** looks like a bike!"
As more and more of her bits arrived in this new world, Lulu noticed here competitors and accelerated.
But just when things where looking really good...
